title: Understanding Trichotillomania
text: Trichotillomania is a condition characterized by an irresistible urge to pull out one's hair. It is often associated with stress or anxiety.

title: Treatment Options
text: There are various treatment options available for trichotillomania, including behavioral therapy and medication.

title: Behavioral Therapy
text: One effective treatment for trichotillomania is behavioral therapy, which helps individuals identify and change their hair-pulling behaviors.

title: Medication
text: Medications, such as antidepressants, can also be used to help manage symptoms of trichotillomania.

title: Combining Treatments
text: A combination of treatments is often the most effective approach for managing trichotillomania.
